name: Dreadmill
description:
Entry for Ludum Dare 47; Theme "Stuck in a Loop"

You are a sticky, slimy dude hopping on a treadmill and chowing down on spooky purgatory stuff. Eat delicious bats and spiders to cultivate mass; avoid pumpkin bombs, as too many carbs will kill your gains.

Controls

  • Space to Jump
  • WASD to move (only in air)
